meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I housecleaned my entire home from top to bottom.
meanings.sent2: She housecleaned the living room before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent3: After I housecleaned, my house sparkled like a diamond.
meanings.sent4: The maid housecleaned the mansion with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: I always feel accomplished after I have housecleaned my space.

meanings.sent1: The housecleaned room smelled fresh and looked spotless.
meanings.sent2: We were greeted by a housecleaned kitchen when we returned from vacation.
meanings.sent3: The housecleaned bathroom was a welcome sight after a long day at work.
meanings.sent4: The housecleaned floors gleamed under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The housecleaned state of the house made me proud of my hard work.
